welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fuji, Japan! Get ready to experience the breathtaking views of Mount Fuji, indulge in delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of this charming city. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Fuji has to offer!

restaurants.name: Sawayaka (さわやか)
restaurants.description: Sawayaka (さわやか) is a steakhouse located in 富士市.
